name: Life Merchant - Original LD44
description:
My original entry for LD44 Jam

You can found the updated version here:

https://webox.itch.io/life-merchant

Graphics

Most graphcis are from one of Kenney's sheet

https://kenney.nl

and added a few of my own trying to keep up with the style.

Music and sounds

Music and soundsbought on the Humble Unity Bundle
